record.title: AUTHORIZING THE CLERK TO MAKE CORRECTIONS IN ENGROSSMENT OF H.R. 3890, TOM LANTOS BLOCK BURMESE JADE (JUNTA'S ANTI-DEMOCRATIC EFFORTS) ACT OF 2008
record.narrative:
AUTHORIZING THE CLERK TO MAKE CORRECTIONS IN ENGROSSMENT OF H.R. 3890, TOM LANTOS BLOCK BURMESE JADE (JUNTA'S ANTI-DEMOCRATIC EFFORTS) ACT OF 2008 -- (House of Representatives - July 16, 2008)

[Page: H6599]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that the Clerk be authorized to make the following changes in the engrossment of the House amendment to the Senate amendment to the text of H.R. 3890 that I have placed at the desk.

record.chair: The Clerk will report the amendment.
record.narrative: Strike subsection (c) of section 6 of the bill and insert the following:
(c) CONFORMING AMENDMENT.--Section 3(b) of the Burmese Freedom and Democracy Act of 2003 (Public Law 108-61; 50 U.S.C. 1701 note) is amended--
(2) by inserting "or section 3A (b)(1) or (c)(1)" after "this section"' and
(3) by striking "a product of Burma" and inserting "subject to such restrictions".
record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Michigan?
